name: pixelPerfect
description:
Your goal is to find a random 8x8 image (for our purposes you may paint it in any color)

After each guess I'll tell you how many pixels are wrong. (Ex. if you paint exactly 1 pixel that was supposed be empty, I'll tell you that you mismatched exactly 1 pixel. )

Controls:

Arrow Keys to Move the invisible Cursor

Space to paint

Q to erase (painting black is not the same as erasing, do that at your own risk)

s-e d-r f-t to change color (red green and blue respectively)

Backspace to check some of your last attempts.
